# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $12000. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
